title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Personalized Nutrition Education: Intensive Short-Term Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Nutrition Concepts and Basic Food Composition Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create personalized nutrition plans tailored to their individual health status
Learners can write food label analysis and evaluation reports based on nutritional concepts
Learners can design and present nutrition education projects for community health promotion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
